line.text: Let me confess that we two must be twain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Although our undivided loves are one
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So shall those blots that do with me remain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Without thy help by me be borne alone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In our two loves there is but one respect
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Though in our lives a separable spite
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which though it alter not love sole effect
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet doth it steal sweet hours from love delight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I may not evermore acknowledge thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Lest my bewailed guilt should do thee shame
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor thou with public kindness honour me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Unless thou take that honour from thy name
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But do not so I love thee in such sort
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As thou being mine mine is thy good report
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
